duties_responsibilities.duty: Experienced in SQL development and solid understanding of RDBMS concepts.
Experience in ETL concepts and tools such as Informatica.
Strong with SQL development knowledge for Relational Databases.
Experience with monitoring & performance tuning Denodo environments.
Experience in scripting languages like Batch, Shell in Unix environment.
Experience with integration of data from multiple data sources like Oracle, SQL server.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, related field, or equivalent work experience.
